name: Space Threat
description:
Space Threat is a game where you have to immerse yourself in a road adventure on an uncharted planet. Get behind the wheel of a space car and go to conquer the peaks! In the game you will find unique places and interesting and varied tasks!

Drive through beautiful locations and dangerous roads, but be careful and avoid obstacles! Be prepared for anything and prove that you can withstand any situation!

Game Features:
- Excellent physics
- Various tasks
- Beautiful graphics
